sentences.english: It can even recommend private holiday nannies and babysitters in Majorca.
sentences.chinese: 它甚至爲你推薦馬略卡島的私人度假保姆和臨時奶媽。

sentences.english: Some prospective wet nurses say that making a good match with the family whose baby they're going to feed is their only priority.
sentences.chinese: 一些準奶媽說，和僱主的契合度是她們認爲最重要的。

sentences.english: In the bedroom, Scarlett is having Mammie measure her waist.
sentences.chinese: 在臥室，奶媽在給思嘉量腰圍。

sentences.english: He also asks that the families go to the hospital together while the wet nurse gets a checkup.
sentences.chinese: 他還要求奶媽體檢時僱主一家人也一塊兒去。

sentences.english: Daytime I am busy at interviewing the pandas the milk father and wet nurses, has not thought anything.
sentences.chinese: 白天我忙着採訪貓貓的奶爸奶媽們，還不覺得什麼。

sentences.english: "This is the rope ladder, " replied the nurse sadly.
sentences.chinese: “這是繩梯，”奶媽悲傷地回答道。

sentences.english: The upswing in demand for wet nurses is raising moral questions.
sentences.chinese: 奶媽需求激增也引發了道德方面的問題。

sentences.english: And his class might be visited by pregnant women and nursing mothers with their babies.
sentences.chinese: 屆時課上還可能有孕婦和帶着嬰兒的奶媽來現身說法。

sentences.english: She had risen, as the nurse said, and the lashes of her eyes were wet with tears.
sentences.chinese: 這位奶媽說，她起來了，眼睫毛都被淚水沾溼了。

definition: (idiom) due to an unexpected turn of events
lit. if it's wrong, it's wrong (idiom); to make the best after a mistake/to accept an error and adapt to it/to muddle through
daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
to chat and laugh/to crack jokes/to banter
to cheat in an online game (abbr. for 開外掛|开外挂[kai1 wai4 gua4])/(coll.) unbelievably good
to have a falling out/to have a big argument
